lead_paragraph: Atletico Madrid cruised to a 3-0 home win over Real Sociedad on Tuesday to close the gap behind La Liga leaders Barcelona to five points.

headline.print_headline: Atletico Win 3-0 to Close Gap to Barcelona
headline.main: Atletico Win 3-0 to Close Gap to Barcelona

snippet: Atletico Madrid cruised to a 3-0 home win over Real Sociedad on Tuesday to close the gap behind La Liga leaders Barcelona to five points....
